DOC.brief_summary: This observational study compare effectiveness dual therapy Type II diabetes mellitus metformin + sitagliptin versus metformin + sulfonylurea routine clinical practice France .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Type II Diabetics Treated With Dual Therapy With Without Sitagliptin ( Januvia速/Xelevia速 , MK-0431-201 )
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes participant De novo treatment ( first prescription date within past 8 week ) : Metformin + sitagliptin dual therapy , Metformin + sulfonylurea dual therapy , Sitagliptin part another treatment regimen Participants also eligible treatment sitagliptin ( Januvia速/Xelevia速 ) sulfonylurea .
